title: Update site reports batch 2/20 with URL validity fields
description:
Update the following site reports to include the new `url_is_current` and `alternate_urls` fields in the [coverage] section:

1. `coag.gov.toml`
2. `courts.alaska.gov.toml`
3. `opinions.arcourts.gov.toml`

title: Research site report: nmsupremecourt.nmcourts.gov (New Mexico Supreme Court)
description:
Create a site research report for nmsupremecourt.nmcourts.gov covering the New Mexico Supreme Court.

Court ID: nm

Note: We already have a report for coa.nmcourts.gov (Court of Appeals). This is for the separate Supreme Court subdomain.

Use Playwright browser automation to explore the site and document:
- Access & authentication requirements
- Technical characteristics (JS requirements, APIs, etc.)
- Available content types
- Robots.txt and rate limiting
- Coverage and historical data

Save the report to: docs/data/site_reports/nmsupremecourt.nmcourts.gov.toml
